works.description:
three products bill mclarens Foundations of Successful Trading, bill mclaren's Time Factor and Bill McLaren's training workbook on trends.  If you will search bill mclaren free download you will see my work offered on numerous free download sites.  This has destroyed my business.  I have not sold a product for many months and this is why.  One site had 16,900 copies downloaded and mulitply that by $475 per download.  Then if you google search bill mclaren you'll find 8 sites that are seilling my pirated copyrite material for 80% discounts.  no one is authorized to sell my goods.  The jackets have copyrite writen on them and the dvds open with a dire copyrite warning.  please stop searches to these theives.  I have hired an internet attorney Dozier internet law.
bill mclaren
